attributes.action: Reduce dole money received by £5 per week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government is spending more on unemployment than the money it receives from income tax.  If everybody's dole money was reduced by £5 per week - this money saved could be used to set up manufacturing companies.  The products could be branded DHSS and free of VAT. Ideas for products would be chocolate, food, drink, shower gels and soap etc.
The new factories would reduce the number of people out of work.
